Trade/Device Name(s): FLEX Monoclonal Rabbit Anti-Human Estrogen Receptor α, Clone EP1, Ready-to-Use (Dako Omnis)
Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded human breast cancer tissue sections
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dako FLEX Monoclonal Rabbit Anti-Human Estrogen Receptor α, Clone EP1, Ready-to-Use (Dako Omnis) immunohistochemistry reagent for detecting estrogen receptor in breast cancer tissue using automated staining.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use with the EnVision FLEX visualization system and Dako Omnis instrument to qualitatively detect human estrogen receptor in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded breast cancer tissue sections for assessment of estrogen receptor status.
